    "DARK SOULST II Crown of the Ivory King" is the third of 3 large-scale

	DLC additions to DARK SOULST II, and includes all-new stages, maps,

	boss characters, weapons & armor! In this third DLC, players will find

	themselves in a world shining bright with the glow of treacherous ice.

	Can you find and recover the lost crown?

    Notes: As the game files completely updated, we've decided to make this

           release a standalone, which includes newest DLC, pre-order DLCs,

		   Crown of the Sunken King DLC, Crown of the Old Irong King DLC
